pages.label: Finance

pages.description: Learn more about Motors Hub, your trusted car dealership.

props.title: Finance
props.heading: Flexible Finance Options to Suit Your Budget
props.subHeading: A dedicated team of finance specialists ready to assist with your application. Through strong partnerships with leading banks and specialist motor finance providers, we’ve helped hundreds of customers secure the right finance package — even if their credit history isn’t perfect.

props.heading: Drive Your Dream Car with Flexible Financing
paragraphs: We believe everyone deserves the car they love — without the stress of upfront costs. Our tailored finance options make it easy and affordable to get behind the wheel. Whether you’re buying your first car or upgrading, we’ll help you find a payment plan that fits your budget.

points.heading: Flexible Finance Plans
points.description: Drive luxury without stretching your budget—pay comfortably over time.

points.heading: Quality You Can Trust
points.description: Choose a plan that fits your lifestyle, not the other way around.

points.heading: Hassle-Free Buying Experience
points.description: Get behind the wheel faster with quick and hassle-free approvals.

points.heading: No Hidden Fees
points.description: What you see is what you pay—no surprises, just transparency.

props.heading: Hire Purchase (HP)
paragraphs: HP offers a simple path to car ownership with fixed monthly payments over 3 to 5 years. Once all payments — including any fees — are made, the car is yours.
While an initial deposit is usually required, some deals offer a zero deposit option. HP is perfect if you want to own the car outright and prefer predictable payments.
If you like switching cars often, HP may not be ideal, as you must settle the agreement first — either by paying off the balance or part exchanging the car.

points.heading: Fixed Monthly Payments
points.description: Enjoy predictable costs with no surprises over the agreement term.

points.heading: Car Ownership Guaranteed
points.description: Own the vehicle outright once the final payment is made.

points.heading: Early Settlement Required
points.description: To switch vehicles early, you'll need to clear the remaining balance.

points.heading: Zero Deposit Deals
points.description: Start driving with little or no upfront payment, depending on the offer.

props.heading: Personal Contract Purchase (PCP)
paragraphs: PCP (Personal Contract Purchase) is a flexible way to finance a used car, allowing for lower monthly payments by deferring a portion of the car’s value until the end of the agreement.

Throughout your PCP term, you enjoy the benefit of driving the car with manageable payments. When the agreement ends, you can either return the car to the lender if you prefer to move on, pay the final balloon payment to take full ownership, or part exchange the vehicle and use any remaining equity as a deposit towards your next car.

PCP is ideal if you’re looking for lower monthly costs and the flexibility to change cars regularly. However, since you don’t own the car until the final payment is made, it may not be the best option if long-term ownership is your goal. Keep in mind that returning the car may also incur charges for excess mileage or wear and tear.

props.heading: Conditional Sale (CS)
paragraphs: Conditional Sale (CS) car finance lets you buy a car with manageable monthly payments. You pay a deposit upfront, then repay the car’s full value plus interest over an agreed term.

With CS finance, the lender buys the car and you make monthly payments until the contract ends. Unlike Hire Purchase, there’s no final fee—ownership automatically transfers once the loan is fully repaid.
CS agreements are flexible—you can adjust the deposit and contract length to suit your budget. It’s a straightforward, transparent way to buy a car without large upfront costs or surprise charges.

pages.label: Warranty
pages.title: Warranty - Motors Hub
pages.description: Learn more about Motors Hub, your trusted car dealership.

props.title: Warranty
props.heading: Protect Your Vehicle From Unexpected Costs
props.subHeading: Enjoy peace of mind with our comprehensive warranty plans, designed to protect you from unexpected repair costs. From mechanical to electrical components, our coverage includes parts, labour, and VAT — all backed by expert support whenever you need it.

props.heading: Explore Our Warranty Options
paragraphs: Unexpected repairs can quickly become expensive without proper coverage. Our comprehensive warranty plans protect thousands of parts and come with a host of valuable benefits — all supported by our friendly, expert team. With us, you can drive with confidence, knowing your vehicle is in safe hands.

We help cover the cost of repairs, including parts, labour, and VAT, up to your individual claim limit. Below is a quick comparison of the plans we offer — be sure to check the full details to choose the warranty that best suits your needs.

points.heading: Comprehensive Coverage
points.description: Thousands of mechanical and electrical parts protected

points.heading: Labour & VAT Included
points.description: Claims cover parts, labour, and VAT up to your limit

points.heading: Flexible Plan Options
points.description: Choose the right warranty level for your needs

points.heading: Trusted Support
points.description: Friendly experts ready to help you every step of the way

warrantyPlans.title: Ultimate
warrantyPlans.description: Comprehensive cover for thousands of parts, including wear and tear, labour, and VAT.
features: Main 12 volt battery (exc. EV’s and Hybrid) for the first 6 months of your cover*
Coil springs and shock absorbers (replaced in pairs)
Hybrid and electric vehicle power generation and transmission parts
Original in-car entertainment, Sat Nav, infotainment and telephone
Remote key fobs or key cards up to £ 250 inc. VAT
Wear and tear up to 100,000 miles
Working materials as part of a valid claim (includes oils, fluids, filters, gaskets, seals)

warrantyPlans.title: Advanced
warrantyPlans.description: Extensive coverage for major systems and components, including parts, labour, VAT, and hybrid/electric elements.
features: Coil Springs and shock absorbers (replaced in pairs)
Hybrid / EV electric motor, electric controller, AC / DC converter
Original in-car entertainment, Sat Nav, infotainment and telephone up to £ 500 inc. VAT
Remote key fobs or key cards up to £ 250 inc. VAT
Working materials as part of a valid repair (oils, antifreeze, fluid, oil filter changes, gaskets & seals)

warrantyPlans.title: Essential
warrantyPlans.description: Covers all core mechanical, electrical, and powertrain components, including working materials for valid repairs.
features: Engine: all major internal moving parts of the engine and the camshaft timing belt / timing chain and tensioners, providing the manufacturer’s replacement recommendations have been compiled with and it is free from all contamination.
Manual / auto gearbox & transmission: all major internal mechanical parts.
Drive system: differential, drive shafts, propshafts, centre bearings, CV and universal joints, bearings & couplings.
Clutch: centre plate, pressure plate, release bearing, ring gear, clutch fork, master cylinder, slave cylinder, clutch pedal and cable.
Braking: master cylinder, wheel cylinders, servo, brake pumps, limiter valve, ABS pump, actuator and modulator, calipers, vacuum pump and brake pedal.
Steering: steering rack and pinion, steering box, pump, idler box, column joints & bearings, pressure pipes, track rod ends and steering column (excludes electric locks and ECU).
Cooling system: air con pump, radiator, water pump, viscous cooling fan coupling and thermostat & housing.

Suspension: shock absorbers & coil springs (replaced in pairs), wishbones, McPherson struts, suspension arms, leaf springs, track control arms & linkages, self-levelling units, anti-roll bar, reservoir pump & regulator valves, kingpins and ball & swivel joints.

Electrical: starter motor / solenoid, alternator, ECU (engine only), voltage regulator, ignition coil, distributor, electronic ignition amplifier, indicator relay, wiper & washer motors, window and sunroof motors, heater fan motor, horn, alarm control unit, cruise control actuator & control unit.
Fuel system: fuel pump, injection pump, lift pump, air flow meter, EGR valve, idle control valve.
Wheel bearings: front and rear bearings.
Hybrid / EV: electric motor, electric controller, AC/DC converter.
Casings: casings, where a covered item caused the damage.
Working materials: as part of a valid repair (oils, antifreeze, fluids, oil filter changes, gaskets & seals).
